mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College's 1928 high school football team. Fourth row (L to R): all unknown. Third row (L to R): unknown, unknown, Brannan, Scott, Wade, unknown, unknown, unknown, Coach Schneider. Second row (L to R): Morehead, unknown, Russell, unknown, Cox, unknown, unknown, Casaretta, Linder. First row (L to R): Sheridan, unknown, unknown, unknown, unknown, Nored, Hunter.

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
